The Maltreatment of Cows in Factory Farms in the UK and Abroad

Can we really place this milk, cheese and meat at our table,
When it’s raised in distress in confinement in a stable.
This cow should be out in the fields,
It is a better way for it live when takings its yield.

Does anyone really want to eat Veal for their dinner?
A calve stolen from its mother are you a sinner?

The milk cows produce is full of hormones, antibiotics and pus,
When drinking factory farmed milk it is not good for us
It is filled with flem and not good for our health or digestion,
Can we not think of an alternative solution?

Do you consider it acceptable to be milked three times?
To me it is an animal welfare crime!

As a mother cow I cannot walk into the shed
Because of the milk between my legs!
I stumble and trip,
Please think of me when my milk you sip!
Before you drink my milk and eat my cheese and my meat,
Let me give you an idea of my life as a cow before you suck at my teat.
As a female I bore a baby calve,
Then at three weeks we are torn in half.
If my baby is a little boy it is taken away and killed for veal
My precious child you did steal!

Upon losing my baby I display,
The same characteristics as a human when faced with dismay.
Under huge emotional distress, I bellow for hours in my stable,
I hide in dark corners stressed and refuse to eat or drink because of the food you want at your table!
In a few months I am inseminated again,
And forced to have another baby which is torn away again!
With milk overflowing I often get mastitis and my udders are raw from constant milking creating milk which contains pus,
Which I can assure you is no good for you or us!

Crammed , caged in unclean quarters and dirty sheds in confinement,
We are treated with ill sentiment! 

After a short four years of constant pregnancies milking cows are fattened up for slaughter,
What a horrific life for a cow daughter.
Upon being taken to an abertoire, we stand on a meatl floor,
With thosands of cows all at once, we thankfully leave our conscience!

In India we are rightfully sacred and blessed,
But in these shores we are treated how we detest.
COMPASSION IN WORLD FARMING clearly states,
That it is an inhumane way to create our fate!

Why not ditch milk filled with hormones and antibiotics and pus altogether,
Go vegan see cows as our treasure.
It is a cruelty free solution
There is so much other food that diminishes animal pollution!
They cannot say thank you so I will say it on their behalf,
Do not I repeat do not steal my calve!
